Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Isorhythmic Atrioventricular Dissociation
Record.Description: A type of atrioventricular dissociation characterized by atria and ventricles beating at similar rates, although independently.
